content: worked in the skip next st 1dc in next 2 sts ch1 skip next st 1dc in round alternatively chain 3 and slip_stitch into the first next st slip_stitch in 3rd chain to join 105 sts chain to create a ring small doily border notes slip_stitch in next ch2sp ch1 does not count as a stitch in for the small doily work rounds 1-3 then see small same ch2sp and in each ch2sp around make 1sc 1hdc doily border 1dc 1hdc 1sc slip_stitch in first single_crochet made to join 60 sts 1 medium doily border large doily border slip_stitch in next ch1sp ch1 does not count as a stitch in slip_stitch in next ch2sp in same ch2sp make 2dc 3trb 2dc same ch1sp make 1sc in next ch1sp make 1dc 3tr 1dc slip_stitch in next ch1sp in next ch2sp make 2dc 3trb 2dc x in next ch1sp make 1sc x 14 in next ch1sp make 1dc 14 slip_stitch in next ch1sp slip_stitch in first double_crochet made to join 3tr 1dc slip_stitch in first single_crochet made to join 90 sts 120 sts finishing fasten_off and weave in the ends using a yarn needle after finishing instead of blocking you can press your doilies under a stack of books to keep the edges neat and flat love to share share your projects with other makers in our online crochet community by tagging your picture with the hashtag #crochetkindly handmaker s notes 2 thank you so much for supporting my little business you are a special part of the online community of crocheters who enable me to continue sharing many of my designs for free a little about me… my name is lorraine and i m a nature-loving mother of 2 living on the sunny mediterranean island of cyprus i grew up in the south of england and take inspiration from my memories there as well as the natural landscapes and wildlife that grace these stunning parts of our world i like to live a simple rustic life often exploring new environments to sit with a hook and animal-kind yarn where my imagination can run wild and free while i love the outdoors nothing quite beats a cozy candlelit corner and a cup of herbal tea at the end of the day where s your favourite place to sit and crochet get in touch and let me know if you like via any of the following ravelry lorrainepugh instagram @consciouslycrochet website www consciouslycrochet com here i share free patterns printables & blog about my yarn-filled world craft a life - close to nature - care for our world coming soon… crochet blanket 3
